mapper.select: select distinct A.AGENT_ID from A_AGENT_BUSINFO A,A_AGENT_COLINFO B where A.BUS_PLATFORM <> '6000' and (A.BUS_TYPE='2' OR A.BUS_TYPE = '6') and A.CLO_PAY_COMPANY <> 'Q000029564' and a.AGENT_ID = B.AGENT_ID and B.CLO_TAX_POINT < 0.06
select distinct A.BUS_NUM,A.AGENT_ID from A_AGENT_BUSINFO A WHERE A.BUS_PLATFORM = '6000' AND (A.BUS_TYPE='2' OR A.BUS_TYPE = '6') AND A.CLO_PAY_COMPANY = 'Q000029564'
